mapper.select: select id, fromid, if(fromid=1,'관리자',username) as username, toid, title, content, created_at, isread from message, members where toid=#{memberid} and memberid=fromid order by created_at desc
select id, fromid, toid, if(toid=1,'관리자',username) as username, title, content, created_at, isread from message, members where fromid=#{memberid} and memberid=toid order by created_at desc
select id, fromid, toid, username, title, content, created_at from message, members where id=#{id} and memberid=fromid
mapper.insert: insert into message(fromid, toid, title, content, created_at) values(#{fromid}, #{toid}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update message set isread=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) where toid=#{memberid} and isread=0
